trans-unit.target: 它們可能會由其他使用者動作，例如快速鍵組合所引發。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 然後將其命名執行個體`Control1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer is over the control and a mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於滑鼠指標位於控制項上，並且按下滑鼠按鍵時。

trans-unit.source: Mouse events occur in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠事件依下列順序發生：

trans-unit.source: The following events are not raised for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> class unless there is at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>.
trans-unit.target: 無法針對引發下列事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>類別除非至少一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>集合： <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>。

trans-unit.source: If there is at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> names appear), the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有至少一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>在集合中，與使用者互動具有索引標籤控制項的標頭 (其中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>名稱會出現)，則<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>引發適當的事件。

trans-unit.source: However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果使用者互動是索引標籤頁面上，工作區內<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>引發適當的事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using different mouse events to draw the path of the mouse on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用不同的滑鼠事件上繪製的路徑滑鼠<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>。

trans-unit.source: A line segment is added to the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> for each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> events that occur.
trans-unit.target: 直線線段加入<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>每個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>所發生的事件。

trans-unit.source: To update the graphics, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A> method is called for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> on each `MouseDown` and `MouseUp` event.
trans-unit.target: 若要更新圖形，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>方法針對呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>每`MouseDown`和`MouseUp`事件。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the graphic path is scrolled up or down when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 此外，圖形的路徑會捲動向上或向下時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel>就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: Additional mouse events, like <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>, are identified on screen as well.
trans-unit.target: 其他的滑鼠事件，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>，以及螢幕上所識別。

trans-unit.source: Also displayed on the screen is additional information about the mouse from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class.
trans-unit.target: 也會顯示在螢幕上會從滑鼠相關的其他資訊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation>類別。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer enters the control.
trans-unit.target: 發生於滑鼠指標進入控制項時。

trans-unit.source: Mouse events occur in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠事件依下列順序發生：

trans-unit.source: The following events are not raised for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> class unless there is at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>.
trans-unit.target: 無法針對引發下列事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>類別除非至少一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>集合： <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>。

trans-unit.source: If there is at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> names appear), the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有至少一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>在集合中，與使用者互動具有索引標籤控制項的標頭 (其中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>名稱會出現)，則<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>引發適當的事件。

trans-unit.source: However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果使用者互動是索引標籤頁面上，工作區內<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>引發適當的事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using different mouse events to draw the path of the mouse on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用不同的滑鼠事件上繪製的路徑滑鼠<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>。

trans-unit.source: A line segment is added to the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> for each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> events that occur.
trans-unit.target: 直線線段加入<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>每個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>所發生的事件。

trans-unit.source: To update the graphics, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A> method is called for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> on each `MouseDown` and `MouseUp` event.
trans-unit.target: 若要更新圖形，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>方法針對呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>每`MouseDown`和`MouseUp`事件。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the graphic path is scrolled up or down when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 此外，圖形的路徑會捲動向上或向下時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel>就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: Additional mouse events, like <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>, are identified on screen as well.
trans-unit.target: 其他的滑鼠事件，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>，以及螢幕上所識別。

trans-unit.source: Also displayed on the screen is additional information about the mouse from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class.
trans-unit.target: 也會顯示在螢幕上會從滑鼠相關的其他資訊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation>類別。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer rests on the control.
trans-unit.target: 發生於滑鼠指標停留在控制項上時。

trans-unit.source: A typical use of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover> is to display a tool tip when the mouse pauses on a control within a specified area around the control (the "hover rectangle").
trans-unit.target: 典型用法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>是當滑鼠停留 （「 停留矩形內，"） 的控制項周圍的指定區域內的控制項上時顯示工具提示。

trans-unit.source: The pause required for this event to be raised is specified in milliseconds by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 以毫秒為單位的指定會引發這個事件所需的暫停<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover> event is defined and detected in connection with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>事件定義，且與偵測到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Mouse events occur in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠事件依下列順序發生：

trans-unit.source: The following events are not raised for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> class unless there is at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>.
trans-unit.target: 無法針對引發下列事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>類別除非至少一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>集合： <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>。

trans-unit.source: If there is at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> names appear), the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有至少一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>在集合中，與使用者互動具有索引標籤控制項的標頭 (其中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>名稱會出現)，則<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>引發適當的事件。

trans-unit.source: However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果使用者互動是索引標籤頁面上，工作區內<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>引發適當的事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the position of the mouse cursor in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 取得滑鼠游標在螢幕座標中的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that contains the coordinates of the mouse cursor relative to the upper-left corner of the screen.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />，包含與螢幕左上角相對的滑鼠游標座標。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MousePosition%2A> property returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Point> that represents the mouse cursor position at the time the property was referenced.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MousePosition%2A>屬性會傳回<xref:System.Drawing.Point>表示滑鼠游標位置時被參考的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates indicate the position on the screen, not relative to the control, and are returned regardless of whether the cursor is positioned over the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示在畫面上，不是相對於控制項的位置座標，以及不論是否將游標放在控制項上時，都會傳回。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates of the upper-left corner of the screen are 0,0.
trans-unit.target: 螢幕左上角的座標是 0，0。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MousePosition%2A> property is identical to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Position%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MousePosition%2A>屬性等同於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Position%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example puts a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> label into an editable state when the user presses ALT+E while the mouse cursor is over the tree node.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>成可編輯狀態時使用者按下 ALT + E 時滑鼠游標位於樹狀節點標籤。

trans-unit.source: After the user is done editing the label, the labels cannot be edited again until the ALT+E key combination is pressed again.
trans-unit.target: 在使用者完成之後編輯標籤時，無法編輯標籤再次直到再次按下 ALT + E 按鍵組合。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: The tree view should also have at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> in its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 樹狀檢視也應該有至少一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>中其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer is over the control and a mouse button is released.
trans-unit.target: 發生於滑鼠指標位於控制項上並放開滑鼠按鍵時。

trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using different mouse events to draw the path of the mouse on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用不同的滑鼠事件上繪製的路徑滑鼠<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>。

trans-unit.source: A line segment is added to the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> for each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> events that occur.
trans-unit.target: 直線線段加入<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>每個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>所發生的事件。

trans-unit.source: To update the graphics, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A> method is called for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> on each `MouseDown` and `MouseUp` event.
trans-unit.target: 若要更新圖形，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>方法針對呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>每`MouseDown`和`MouseUp`事件。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the graphic path is scrolled up or down when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 此外，圖形的路徑會捲動向上或向下時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel>就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: Additional mouse events, like <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>, are identified on screen as well.
trans-unit.target: 其他的滑鼠事件，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>，以及螢幕上所識別。

trans-unit.source: Also displayed on the screen is additional information about the mouse from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class.
trans-unit.target: 也會顯示在螢幕上會從滑鼠相關的其他資訊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation>類別。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse wheel moves while the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 發生於滑鼠滾輪移動且焦點在控制項時。

trans-unit.source: When handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel> event it is important to follow the user interface (UI) standards associated with the mouse wheel.
trans-unit.target: 當處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel>事件，請務必遵循與滑鼠滾輪相關聯的使用者介面 (UI) 標準。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Delta%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property value indicates the amount the mouse wheel has been moved.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Delta%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性值，指出已移動滑鼠滾輪的量。

trans-unit.source: The UI should scroll when the accumulated delta is plus or minus 120.
trans-unit.target: 當累積的差異是加號或減號 120 時，應該捲動 UI。

trans-unit.source: The UI should scroll the number of logical lines returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseWheelScrollLines%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property for every delta value reached.
trans-unit.target: UI 應該捲動的邏輯所傳回的行數<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseWheelScrollLines%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>達到每個差異值的屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can also scroll more smoothly in smaller that 120 unit increments, however the ratio should remain constant, that is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseWheelScrollLines%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> lines scrolled per 120 delta units of wheel movement.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以捲動更平順地在較小 120 單位增加，不過比率應該維持不變，也就是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseWheelScrollLines%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>每 120 差異單位滾輪捲動的行。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling mouse wheel messages, see the[WM_MOUSEWHEEL](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms645617\(v=vs.85\).aspx)topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需處理滑鼠滾輪訊息的詳細資訊，請參閱[WM_MOUSEWHEEL](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms645617\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主題。

trans-unit.source: Mouse events occur in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠事件依下列順序發生：

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Move> event to display the location of the form in screen coordinates on the caption bar of the form.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Move>事件 以顯示在表單的標題列上的螢幕座標中表單的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name%2A> property can be used at run time to evaluate the object by name rather than type and programmatic name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name%2A>屬性可以在執行階段中用來評估物件，依名稱而不是類型和程式設計名稱。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name%2A> property returns a <xref:System.String> type, it can be evaluated in case-style logic statements (`Select` statement in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], `switch` statement in Visual C# and [!INCLUDE[vcprvc](~/includes/vcprvc-md.md)]).
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name%2A>屬性會傳回<xref:System.String>型別，可以依照案例樣式邏輯陳述式進行評估 (`Select`陳述式中的[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]，`switch`陳述式在 Visual C# 和[!INCLUDE[vcprvc](~/includes/vcprvc-md.md)])。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name%2A> of a control in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox> when the control is added or removed from a form.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name%2A>中的控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>時新增或移除從表單控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the area to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，表示要失效的區域。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidated" /> event with a specified region of the control to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidated" /> 事件，包含要失效的指定控制項區域。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSizeChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSizeChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnAutoSizeChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnAutoSizeChanged%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnAutoSizeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnAutoSizeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnAutoSizeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnAutoSizeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColorChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColorChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnBackColorChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnBackColorChanged%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is an event-raising method that is executed when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例是事件引發的方法，是執行時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>屬性值變更。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class has several methods with the name pattern `On`*PropertyName*`Changed` that raise the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event when the *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>類別有數種方法具有名稱模式`On` *PropertyName* `Changed` ，會引發對應的*PropertyName* `Changed`事件時*PropertyName*值變更 (*PropertyName*代表對應屬性的名稱)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example changes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> derived class displaying currency data.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>衍生的類別顯示貨幣資料。

trans-unit.source: The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> if the number is negative and to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> if the number is positive.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會將文字轉換成十進位數字和變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>至<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>如果數值為負數，<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>如果數字為正數。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a class that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您具有類別衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>類別。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnBackColorChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnBackColorChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnBackColorChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnBackColorChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is an event-raising method that is executed when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例是事件引發的方法，是執行時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>屬性值變更。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class has several methods with the name pattern `On`*PropertyName*`Changed` that raise the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event when the *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>類別有數種方法具有名稱模式`On` *PropertyName* `Changed` ，會引發對應的*PropertyName* `Changed`事件時*PropertyName*值變更 (*PropertyName*代表對應屬性的名稱)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example changes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> derived class displaying currency data.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>衍生的類別顯示貨幣資料。

trans-unit.source: The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> if the number is negative and to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> if the number is positive.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會將文字轉換成十進位數字和變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>至<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>如果數值為負數，<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>如果數字為正數。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a class that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您具有類別衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is an event-raising method that is executed when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例是事件引發的方法，是執行時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>屬性值變更。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class has several methods with the name pattern `On`*PropertyName*`Changed` that raise the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event when the *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>類別有數種方法具有名稱模式`On` *PropertyName* `Changed` ，會引發對應的*PropertyName* `Changed`事件時*PropertyName*值變更 (*PropertyName*代表對應屬性的名稱)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example changes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> derived class displaying currency data.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>衍生的類別顯示貨幣資料。

trans-unit.source: The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> if the number is negative and to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> if the number is positive.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會將文字轉換成十進位數字和變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>至<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>如果數值為負數，<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>如果數字為正數。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a class that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您具有類別衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>類別。

trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnEnter(System.EventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnEnter(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnFontChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnFontChanged%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is an event-raising method that is executed when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例是事件引發的方法，是執行時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>屬性值變更。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class has several methods with the name pattern `On`*PropertyName*`Changed` that raise the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event when the *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>類別有數種方法具有名稱模式`On` *PropertyName* `Changed` ，會引發對應的*PropertyName* `Changed`事件時*PropertyName*值變更 (*PropertyName*代表對應屬性的名稱)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example changes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> derived class displaying currency data.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>衍生的類別顯示貨幣資料。

trans-unit.source: The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> if the number is negative and to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> if the number is positive.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會將文字轉換成十進位數字和變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>至<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>如果數值為負數，<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>如果數字為正數。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a class that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您具有類別衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>類別。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnFontChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnFontChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

trans-unit.source: The following code example is an event-raising method that is executed when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例是事件引發的方法，是執行時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>屬性值變更。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class has several methods with the name pattern `On`*PropertyName*`Changed` that raise the corresponding *PropertyName* `Changed` event when the *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>類別有數種方法具有名稱模式`On` *PropertyName* `Changed` ，會引發對應的*PropertyName* `Changed`事件時*PropertyName*值變更 (*PropertyName*代表對應屬性的名稱)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example changes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> derived class displaying currency data.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>衍生的類別顯示貨幣資料。

trans-unit.source: The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> if the number is negative and to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> if the number is positive.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會將文字轉換成十進位數字和變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>至<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>如果數值為負數，<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>如果數字為正數。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a class that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您具有類別衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>類別。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMove(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMove(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> that represents the Windows message.
trans-unit.target: 代表 Windows 訊息的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the control of Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: 將 Windows 訊息通知控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnNotifyMessage%2A> method is called if the control's `EnableNotifyMessage` style bit is set in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnNotifyMessage%2A>呼叫方法時若控制項的`EnableNotifyMessage`樣式位元會設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>。

trans-unit.source: The `EnableNotifyMessage` style in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> enables the control to be notified when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> method receives a Windows message.
trans-unit.target: `EnableNotifyMessage`中設定樣式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>啟用時通知控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>方法會接收 Windows 訊息。

trans-unit.source: With this method, semi-trusted controls can listen for Windows messages without enabling them to modify the message.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法，非完全信任的控制項可以接聽 Windows 訊息，而不讓他們能夠修改訊息。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnNotifyMessage(System.Windows.Forms.Message)" /> in a derived class, calling the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnNotifyMessage(System.Windows.Forms.Message)" /> method is not necessary because there is no initial implementation.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnNotifyMessage(System.Windows.Forms.Message)" />衍生類別中呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnNotifyMessage(System.Windows.Forms.Message)" />方法不需要，因為沒有初始的實作。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaddingChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaddingChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaddingChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaddingChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A>方法也可讓衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: The following code example enables the user to drag an image or image file onto the form, and have it be displayed at the point on which it is dropped.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例可讓使用者將是影像或影像檔案拖曳至表單，並將其顯示在其上卸除的點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> method is overridden to repaint the image each time the form is painted; otherwise the image would only persist until the next repainting.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A>表單繪製每次重新繪製影像會覆寫方法; 否則為映像就只會一直保存到下一步 重新繪製。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> event-handling method determines the type of data being dragged into the form and provides the appropriate feedback.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>事件處理方法判斷被拖曳至表單的資料類型，並提供適當的回應。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop> event-handling method displays the image on the form, if an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> can be created from the data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop>事件處理方法會顯示在表單中，影像如果<xref:System.Drawing.Image>可以從資料建立。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> values are screen coordinates, the example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PointToClient%2A> method to convert them to client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>值螢幕座標，這個範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PointToClient%2A>方法，將它們轉換為用戶端座標。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> that contains information about the control to paint.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" />，含有要繪製的控制項資訊。

trans-unit.source: Paints the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: 繪製控制項的背景。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaintBackground%2A> method enables derived classes to handle Windows background erase requests.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaintBackground%2A>方法可讓衍生的類別處理 Windows 背景清除要求。

trans-unit.source: Inheriting classes should override this method to handle the erase background request from windows.
trans-unit.target: 繼承的類別應該覆寫此方法以處理從 windows 清除背景要求。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaintBackground(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> in a derived class it is not necessary to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaintBackground(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" />.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaintBackground(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" />衍生類別中則不需要呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaintBackground(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColorChanged" /> event when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor" /> property value of the control's container changes.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項容器的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColorChanged" /> 屬性值變更時，會引發 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnParentBackColorChanged%2A> method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnParentBackColorChanged%2A>方法也可讓衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

trans-unit.source: The following code example is an event-raising method that is executed when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例是事件引發的方法，是執行時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>屬性值變更。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class has several methods with the name pattern `On`*PropertyName*`Changed` that raise the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event when the *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>類別有數種方法具有名稱模式`On` *PropertyName* `Changed` ，會引發對應的*PropertyName* `Changed`事件時*PropertyName*值變更 (*PropertyName*代表對應屬性的名稱)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example changes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> derived class displaying currency data.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>衍生的類別顯示貨幣資料。

trans-unit.source: The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> if the number is negative and to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> if the number is positive.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會將文字轉換成十進位數字和變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>至<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>如果數值為負數，<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>如果數字為正數。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a class that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您具有類別衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>類別。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnParentBackColorChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnParentBackColorChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: After dragging has begun, this method is called repeatedly by the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] until the drag operation is either canceled or completed.
trans-unit.target: 拖曳開始之後，這個方法就會呼叫重複[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]直到取消或完成拖曳作業為止。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you want to change the point at which dragging is canceled or at which a drop occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要變更在取消拖曳的或卸除發生所在的點，請覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is an event-raising method that is executed when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例是事件引發的方法，是執行時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>屬性值變更。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class has several methods with the name pattern `On`*PropertyName*`Changed` that raise the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event when the *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>類別有數種方法具有名稱模式`On` *PropertyName* `Changed` ，會引發對應的*PropertyName* `Changed`事件時*PropertyName*值變更 (*PropertyName*代表對應屬性的名稱)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example changes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> derived class displaying currency data.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>衍生的類別顯示貨幣資料。

trans-unit.source: The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> if the number is negative and to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> if the number is positive.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會將文字轉換成十進位數字和變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>至<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>如果數值為負數，<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>如果數字為正數。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a class that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您具有類別衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>類別。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnRightToLeftChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnRightToLeftChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class has several methods with the name pattern `On`*PropertyName*`Changed` that raise the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event when the *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>類別有數種方法具有名稱模式`On` *PropertyName* `Changed` ，會引發對應的*PropertyName* `Changed`事件時*PropertyName*值變更 (*PropertyName*代表對應屬性的名稱)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets padding within the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項內的邊框間距。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> representing the control's internal spacing characteristics.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />，表示控制項的內部間距特性。

trans-unit.source: For containers such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A> property gets or sets their respective <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DisplayRectangle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 這類容器<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A>屬性取得或設定其各自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DisplayRectangle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPadding%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is equal to its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPadding%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性等於其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Controls receive default values for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A> that are reasonably close to Windows user interface guidelines.
trans-unit.target: 控制項可接收的預設值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A>所相當接近 Windows 使用者介面指導方針。

trans-unit.source: Some adjustments might still be necessary for particular applications.
trans-unit.target: 一些調整仍可能需要特定的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: All controls that implement <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize%2A> are enlarged by the amount in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A> when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 實作所有控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize%2A>中數量來放大<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A>時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize%2A>是`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following controls do not use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A>:
trans-unit.target: 下列控制項不使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A>:

trans-unit.source: Controls that do not implement <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize%2A> through <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize%2A>
trans-unit.target: 控制項不會實作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize%2A>透過 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Custom controls that directly inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>
trans-unit.target: 直接繼承自的自訂控制項 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control's padding changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於控制項的邊框間距變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PaddingChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PaddingChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PaddingChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然後將其命名執行個體`Control1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PaddingChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: 發生於重繪控制項時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event is raised when the control is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>生於重繪控制項時，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: It passes an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> to the method(s) that handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: 它的執行個體傳遞<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>要處理的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件。

trans-unit.source: When creating a new custom control or an inherited control with a different visual appearance, you must provide code to render the control by overriding the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當建立新的自訂控制項或繼承的控制項使用不同的視覺外觀，您必須提供程式碼，以呈現控制項，藉由覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Overriding the OnPaint Method](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/overriding-the-onpaint-method.md) and [Custom Control Painting and Rendering](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/custom-control-painting-and-rendering.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[覆寫 OnPaint 方法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/overriding-the-onpaint-method.md)和[自訂控制項繪製和轉譯](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/custom-control-painting-and-rendering.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> control on the form and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event to draw to it.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>控制項在表單和使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>繪製它的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the parent container of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的父容器。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> that represents the parent or container control of the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />，表示控制項的父代或容器控制項。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A> property value to `null` removes the control from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> of its current parent control.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A>屬性值設定為`null`移除控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>其目前的父控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FindForm%2A> method to set properties on the parent control of a button and its form.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FindForm%2A>方法來設定上的按鈕和其表單父控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: for all windows to get this property value.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得這個屬性值的所有視窗。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent" /> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent" /> 屬性值變更時。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果會引發這個事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A>以程式設計方式修改或使用者互動變更屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: Forces the control to apply layout logic to child controls.
trans-unit.target: 強制控制項將配置邏輯套用至子控制項。

trans-unit.source: Forces the control to apply layout logic to all its child controls.
trans-unit.target: 強制控制項將配置邏輯套用至其所有子控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method was called before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A> method, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event is suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>方法呼叫之前先呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A>方法，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>隱藏的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedControl%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedProperty%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs> created are set to `null` if no values were provided when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A> method was called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedControl%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedProperty%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs>建立會設為`null`如果已不提供任何值時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A>呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates ways in which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 它也會示範方式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the `Click` event handler for `Button1` explicitly calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，`Click`事件處理常式`Button1`明確呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The `Click` event handler for `Button2` implicitly calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A>.
trans-unit.target: `Click`事件處理常式`Button2`隱含地呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A> is also called when the form is loaded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A> 也稱為當表單載入時。

trans-unit.source: `Button3` returns the control to the state it was in when loaded.
trans-unit.target: `Button3` 傳回的控制項來載入時的狀態。

trans-unit.source: In each case, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 在每個案例中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: This is a complete example.
trans-unit.target: 這是完整的範例。
