trans-unit.target: 要執行此範例中，貼上下列程式碼空白表單中。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> that represents the most recently changed control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />，表示最新變更的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The name of the most recently changed property on the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項上最新變更之屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Forces the control to apply layout logic to all its child controls.
trans-unit.target: 強制控制項將配置邏輯套用至其所有子控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method was called before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A> method, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event is suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>方法呼叫之前先呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A>方法，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>隱藏的事件。

trans-unit.source: The `affectedControl` and `affectedProperty` parameters can both be set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: `affectedControl`和`affectedProperty`參數都設定為`null`。

trans-unit.source: Doing so causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedControl%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedProperty%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs> created to be set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 執行動作，原因<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedControl%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedProperty%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs>建立設為`null`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates ways in which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 它也會示範方式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the `Click` event handler for `Button1` explicitly calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，`Click`事件處理常式`Button1`明確呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The `Click` event handler for `Button2` implicitly calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A>.
trans-unit.target: `Click`事件處理常式`Button2`隱含地呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A> is also called when the form is loaded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A> 也稱為當表單載入時。

trans-unit.source: `Button3` returns the control to the state it was in when loaded.
trans-unit.target: `Button3` 傳回的控制項來載入時的狀態。

trans-unit.source: In each case, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 在每個案例中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: This is a complete example.
trans-unit.target: 這是完整的範例。

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a blank form.
trans-unit.target: 要執行此範例中，貼上下列程式碼空白表單中。

trans-unit.source: The screen coordinate <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的螢幕座標 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />。

trans-unit.source: Computes the location of the specified screen point into client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的螢幕點的位置計算為工作區座標 (Client Coordinate)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that represents the converted <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />, <paramref name="p" />, in client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />，以工作區座標表示的轉換後 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> (<paramref name="p" />)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example enables the user to drag an image or image file onto the form, and have it be displayed at the point on it is dropped.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會啟用卸除使用者將是影像或影像檔案拖曳至表單，並將其顯示在其上的點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> method is overridden to repaint the image each time the form is painted; otherwise the image would only persist until the next repainting.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A>表單繪製每次重新繪製影像會覆寫方法; 否則為映像就只會一直保存到下一步 重新繪製。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> event-handling method determines the type of data being dragged into the form and provides the appropriate feedback.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>事件處理方法判斷被拖曳至表單的資料類型，並提供適當的回應。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop> event-handling method displays the image on the form, if an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> can be created from the data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop>事件處理方法會顯示在表單中，影像如果<xref:System.Drawing.Image>可以從資料建立。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> values are screen coordinates, the example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PointToClient%2A> method to convert them to client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>值螢幕座標，這個範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PointToClient%2A>方法，將它們轉換為用戶端座標。

trans-unit.source: The client coordinate <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的工作區座標 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />。

trans-unit.source: Computes the location of the specified client point into screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的工作區點的位置計算為螢幕座標。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that represents the converted <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />, <paramref name="p" />, in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />，以螢幕座標表示的轉換後 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> (<paramref name="p" />)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RectangleToScreen%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PointToScreen%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseButtons%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlPaint.DrawReversibleFrame%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.IntersectsWith%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> members.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RectangleToScreen%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PointToScreen%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseButtons%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlPaint.DrawReversibleFrame%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.IntersectsWith%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>成員。

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form called Form1 containing several controls.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例，下列的程式碼貼在名為 Form1 表單包含多個控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> events are connected to the event handlers defined in the example.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>事件都已連接的範例中定義的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of a rectangular area into which the control can fit.
trans-unit.target: 取得能夠容納控制項的矩形區域的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> containing the height and width, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，包含高度和寬度 (單位為像素)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> that represents the message to process.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />，表示要處理的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Preprocesses keyboard or input messages within the message loop before they are dispatched.
trans-unit.target: 先於訊息迴圈中前置處理鍵盤或輸入訊息後，再分派這些訊息。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PreProcessControlState" /> values, depending on whether <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" /> is <see langword="true" /> or <see langword="false" /> and whether <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)" /> or <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar(System.Char)" /> are <see langword="true" /> or <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PreProcessControlState" /> 值，取決於 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" /> 是 <see langword="true" /> 或 <see langword="false" />，以及 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)" /> 或 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar(System.Char)" /> 是 <see langword="true" /> 或 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />, passed by reference, that represents the message to process.
trans-unit.target: 由參考傳遞的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />，表示要處理的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The possible values are WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_CHAR, and WM_SYSCHAR.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值包括 WM_KEYDOWN、WM_SYSKEYDOWN、WM_CHAR 和 WM_SYSCHAR。

trans-unit.source: Preprocesses keyboard or input messages within the message loop before they are dispatched.
trans-unit.target: 先於訊息迴圈中前置處理鍵盤或輸入訊息後，再分派這些訊息。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message was processed by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項已處理訊息，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A> is called by the application's message loop to preprocess input messages before they are dispatched.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A> 會呼叫預先處理輸入的訊息，再分派這些應用程式的訊息迴圈。

trans-unit.source: Possible values for the `msg` parameter are WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_CHAR, and WM_SYSCHAR.
trans-unit.target: 可能值`msg`參數是 WM_KEYDOWN、 WM_SYSKEYDOWN、 WM_CHAR 和 WM_SYSCHAR。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A>, a control should return `true` to indicate that it has processed the message.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A>，控制項應該傳回`true`指出它已處理訊息。

trans-unit.source: For messages that are not processed by the control, the result of `base.PreProcessMessage` should be returned.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的結果不會處理的訊息`base.PreProcessMessage`應該傳回。

trans-unit.source: Controls will typically override one of the more specialized methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessCmdKey%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A> instead of overriding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 控制項將通常會覆寫其中一個更具特製化的方法如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessCmdKey%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A>而不是覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A>。

trans-unit.source: for all windows for the immediate caller to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 立即呼叫者，才能呼叫此方法的所有視窗。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see langword="AllWindows" /> value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />.
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯：<see langword="AllWindows" />值<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown" /> event when a key is pressed while focus is on this control.
trans-unit.target: 發生於焦點位於這個控制項上時並按下鍵盤按鍵的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown" /> 事件之前。

trans-unit.source: Some key presses, such as the TAB, RETURN, ESC, and arrow keys, are typically ignored by some controls because they are not considered input key presses.
trans-unit.target: 某些按鍵，例如索引標籤、 RETURN、 esc 鍵和方向鍵，某些控制項通常會忽略，因為它們不會被視為輸入的按鍵。

trans-unit.source: For example, by default, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> control ignores the arrow keys.
trans-unit.target: 例如，根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>忽略的箭頭按鍵的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Pressing the arrow keys typically causes the focus to move to the previous or next control.
trans-unit.target: 按下方向鍵時，通常會導致焦點移到上一個或下一個控制項。

trans-unit.source: The arrow keys are considered navigation keys and pressing these keys typically do not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> event for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: 使用方向鍵來瀏覽鍵並按下這些機碼通常不會引發視為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>事件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>。

trans-unit.source: However, pressing the arrow keys for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> does raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown> event.
trans-unit.target: 不過，按箭號的索引鍵<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>未引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown>事件。

trans-unit.source: By handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown> event for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> and setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PreviewKeyDownEventArgs.IsInputKey%2A> property to `true`, you can raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> event when the arrow keys are pressed.
trans-unit.target: 藉由處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown>事件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>和設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PreviewKeyDownEventArgs.IsInputKey%2A>屬性`true`，您可以提高<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>事件時按下方向鍵。

trans-unit.source: However, if you handle the arrow keys, the focus will no longer move to the previous or next control.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您要處理的箭頭按鍵，將不會再將焦點移至前一個或下一個控制項。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> that includes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> has the focus and you press the UP ARROW or DOWN ARROW keys, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> appears.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>擁有焦點且按向上鍵或向下鍵，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>隨即出現。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown> event handler detects when the UP ARROW or DOWN ARROW keys are pressed and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PreviewKeyDownEventArgs.IsInputKey%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown>按下向上或向下鍵時偵測到事件處理常式，並設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PreviewKeyDownEventArgs.IsInputKey%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: This raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> event so that you can display the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 這會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>事件，以便您可以顯示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>。

trans-unit.source: You should not put any logic in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown> event handler, other than to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PreviewKeyDownEventArgs.IsInputKey%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您不應該將任何邏輯放在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown>事件處理常式，而不是要設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PreviewKeyDownEventArgs.IsInputKey%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you should put your logic in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，您應該將您的邏輯放在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: 由參考所傳遞的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />，代表要處理的視窗訊息。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> 值，表示要處理的按鍵。

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: 處理命令按鍵。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the character was processed by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果字元已由控制項處理，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle command keys.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法是在處理命令的索引鍵前置處理的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Command keys are keys that always take precedence over regular input keys.
trans-unit.target: 命令索引鍵是一律優先於一般輸入索引鍵的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Examples of command keys include accelerators and menu shortcuts.
trans-unit.target: 命令索引鍵的範例包括加速器及功能表快速鍵。

trans-unit.source: The method must return `true` to indicate that it has processed the command key, or `false` to indicate that the key is not a command key.
trans-unit.target: 此方法必須傳回`true`指出它已處理命令按鍵，或`false`表示索引鍵不命令按鍵。

trans-unit.source: This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項裝載在 Windows Forms 應用程式，或為 ActiveX 控制項時，只會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessCmdKey%2A> method first determines whether the control has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>, and if so, enables the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> to process the command key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessCmdKey%2A>方法會先判斷控制項是否有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>，若是如此，可讓和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>處理命令按鍵。

trans-unit.source: If the command key is not a menu shortcut and the control has a parent, the key is passed to the parent's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessCmdKey%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令按鍵不功能表快顯控制項具有父代，金鑰會傳遞給父<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessCmdKey%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The net effect is that command keys are "bubbled" up the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 最後的結果會是索引鍵 「 昇 」 在控制項階層架構該命令。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the key the user pressed, the key data also indicates which, if any, modifier keys were pressed at the same time as the key.
trans-unit.target: 除了使用者按下索引鍵，索引鍵的資料也會指出它，如果有的話，在按下輔助按鍵做為索引鍵相同的時間。

trans-unit.source: Modifier keys include the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys.
trans-unit.target: 輔助按鍵包含 SHIFT、 CTRL 和 ALT 鍵。

trans-unit.source: for the immediate caller and inheriting classes to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 直接呼叫端和繼承的類別呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessCmdKey(System.Windows.Forms.Message@,System.Windows.Forms.Keys)" /> method in a derived class, a control should return <see langword="true" /> to indicate that it has processed the key.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessCmdKey(System.Windows.Forms.Message@,System.Windows.Forms.Keys)" />方法在衍生類別中的，控制項應該傳回<see langword="true" />以表示它具有處理金鑰。

trans-unit.source: For keys that are not processed by the control, the result of calling the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessCmdKey(System.Windows.Forms.Message@,System.Windows.Forms.Keys)" /> method should be returned.
trans-unit.target: 針對該控制項，呼叫基底類別的結果不會處理識別碼<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessCmdKey(System.Windows.Forms.Message@,System.Windows.Forms.Keys)" />方法應該傳回。

trans-unit.source: Controls will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.
trans-unit.target: 控制項很少，如果有的話，必須覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: 要處理的字元。

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog character.
trans-unit.target: 處理對話方塊字元。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the character was processed by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果字元已由控制項處理，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog characters, such as control mnemonics.
trans-unit.target: 訊息以處理對話方塊字元，例如控制項的助憶鍵前置處理期間，會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is called only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A> method indicates that the control is not processing the character.
trans-unit.target: 只有當呼叫這個方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>方法表示控制項未處理的字元。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A> method simply sends the character to the parent's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A> method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A>方法只是傳送至父代的字元<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A>方法或傳回`false`如果控制項沒有父代。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog characters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>類別會覆寫此方法以執行實際處理對話方塊字元。

trans-unit.source: This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項裝載在 Windows Forms 應用程式，或為 ActiveX 控制項時，只會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: for all windows for inheriting classes to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 繼承類別呼叫這個方法的所有視窗。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see langword="AllWindows" /> value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />.
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯：<see langword="AllWindows" />值<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar(System.Char)" /> method in a derived class, a control should return <see langword="true" /> to indicate that it has processed the character.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar(System.Char)" />方法在衍生類別中的，控制項應該傳回<see langword="true" />指出它已處理的字元。

trans-unit.source: For characters that are not processed by the control, the result of calling the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar(System.Char)" /> method should be returned.
trans-unit.target: 字元的控制項，呼叫基底類別的結果不會處理<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar(System.Char)" />方法應該傳回。

trans-unit.source: Controls will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.
trans-unit.target: 控制項很少，如果有的話，必須覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> 值，表示要處理的按鍵。

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog key.
trans-unit.target: 處理對話方塊按鍵。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the key was processed by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果按鍵已由控制項處理，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog characters, such as TAB, RETURN, ESC, and arrow keys.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法是在處理對話方塊字元，例如 TAB、 RETURN、 esc 鍵，和方向鍵前置處理的訊息。

trans-unit.source: This method is called only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A> method indicates that the control is not processing the key.
trans-unit.target: 只有當呼叫這個方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>方法表示控制項未處理的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A> simply sends the character to the parent's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A> method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A>只傳送至父代的字元<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A>方法或傳回`false`如果控制項沒有父代。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog keys.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>類別會覆寫此方法以執行實際處理對話方塊按鍵。

trans-unit.source: This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項裝載在 Windows Forms 應用程式，或為 ActiveX 控制項時，只會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.target: 針對該控制項，呼叫基底類別的結果不會處理識別碼<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar(System.Char)" />方法應該傳回。

trans-unit.source: Controls will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.
trans-unit.target: 控制項很少，如果有的話，必須覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: 由參考所傳遞的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />，代表要處理的視窗訊息。

trans-unit.source: Processes a key message and generates the appropriate control events.
trans-unit.target: 處理按鍵訊息，並產生適當的控制項事件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message was processed by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項已處理訊息，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when a control receives a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項收到鍵盤訊息，會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The method is responsible for generating the appropriate key events for the message by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyPress%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyDown%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyUp%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 方法是負責產生適當的索引鍵事件訊息，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyPress%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyDown%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyUp%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The `m` parameter contains the window message that must be processed.
trans-unit.target: `m`參數包含必須處理的視窗訊息。

trans-unit.source: Possible values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property are WM_CHAR, WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_KEYUP, WM_SYSKEYUP, and WM_IME_CHAR.
trans-unit.target: 可能值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性是 WM_CHAR、 WM_KEYDOWN、 WM_SYSKEYDOWN、 WM_KEYUP、 WM_SYSKEYUP 和 WM_IME_CHAR。

trans-unit.source: for all windows for inheriting classes to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 繼承類別呼叫這個方法的所有視窗。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see langword="AllWindows" /> value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />.
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯：<see langword="AllWindows" />值<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />。

trans-unit.source: for the immediate caller to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 立即呼叫者呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼。

trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyEventArgs(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" /> method in a derived class, a control should return <see langword="true" /> to indicate that it has processed the key.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyEventArgs(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" />方法在衍生類別中的，控制項應該傳回<see langword="true" />以表示它具有處理金鑰。

trans-unit.source: For keys that are not processed by the control, the result of calling the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyEventArgs(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" /> method should be returned.
trans-unit.target: 針對該控制項，呼叫基底類別的結果不會處理識別碼<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyEventArgs(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" />方法應該傳回。

trans-unit.source: Controls will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.
trans-unit.target: 控制項很少，如果有的話，必須覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: 由參考所傳遞的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />，代表要處理的視窗訊息。

trans-unit.source: Processes a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: 處理鍵盤訊息。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message was processed by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項已處理訊息，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when a control receives a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項收到鍵盤訊息，會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The method first determines whether the control has a parent; if so, it calls the parent's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法會先判斷控制項是否具有父代。因此，它會呼叫父如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the parent's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A> method does not process the message then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyEventArgs%2A> method is called to generate the appropriate keyboard events.
trans-unit.target: 如果父代的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A>方法不會處理訊息則<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyEventArgs%2A>方法呼叫來產生適當的鍵盤事件。

trans-unit.source: The `m` parameter contains the window message that must be processed.
trans-unit.target: `m`參數包含必須處理的視窗訊息。

trans-unit.source: Possible values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property are WM_CHAR, WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_KEYUP, and WM_SYSKEYUP.
trans-unit.target: 可能值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性是 WM_CHAR、 WM_KEYDOWN、 WM_SYSKEYDOWN、 WM_KEYUP 和 WM_SYSKEYUP。

trans-unit.source: for all windows for inheriting classes to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 繼承類別呼叫這個方法的所有視窗。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see langword="AllWindows" /> value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />.
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯：<see langword="AllWindows" />值<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyMessage(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" /> method, a control should return <see langword="true" /> to indicate that it has processed the key.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyMessage(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" />方法中，控制項應該傳回<see langword="true" />以表示它具有處理金鑰。

trans-unit.source: For keys that are not processed by the control, the result of the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyEventArgs(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" /> should be returned.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的基底類別的結果不會處理的按鍵<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyEventArgs(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" />應該傳回。

trans-unit.source: Controls will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.
trans-unit.target: 控制項很少，如果有的話，必須覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: 由參考所傳遞的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />，代表要處理的視窗訊息。

trans-unit.source: Previews a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: 預覽鍵盤訊息。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message was processed by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項已處理訊息，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by a child control when the child control receives a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法稱為由子控制項的子控制項收到鍵盤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The child control calls this method before generating any keyboard events for the message.
trans-unit.target: 子控制項產生訊息的任何鍵盤事件之前呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: If this method returns `true`, the child control considers the message processed and does not generate any keyboard events.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法傳回`true`，子控制項處理的訊息會考量並不會產生任何鍵盤事件。

trans-unit.source: The `m` parameter contains the window message to preview.
trans-unit.target: `m`參數包含要預覽的視窗訊息。

trans-unit.source: Possible values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property are WM_CHAR, WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_KEYUP, and WM_SYSKEYUP.
trans-unit.target: 可能值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性是 WM_CHAR、 WM_KEYDOWN、 WM_SYSKEYDOWN、 WM_KEYUP 和 WM_SYSKEYUP。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A> method simply sends the character to the parent's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A> method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A>方法只是傳送至父代的字元<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A>方法或傳回`false`如果控制項沒有父代。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog keys.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>類別會覆寫此方法以執行實際處理對話方塊按鍵。

trans-unit.source: for all windows for inheriting classes to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 繼承類別呼叫這個方法的所有視窗。

trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯：<see langword="AllWindows" />值<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />。

trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" /> method in a derived class, a control should return <see langword="true" /> to indicate that it has processed the key.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" />方法在衍生類別中的，控制項應該傳回<see langword="true" />以表示它具有處理金鑰。

trans-unit.source: For keys that are not processed by the control, the result of calling the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" /> method should be returned.
trans-unit.target: 針對該控制項，呼叫基底類別的結果不會處理識別碼<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" />方法應該傳回。

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: 要處理的字元。

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: 處理助憶鍵字元。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項已將字元當成助憶鍵處理，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called to give a control the opportunity to process a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法被呼叫要讓控制項有機會處理助憶鍵字元。

trans-unit.source: The method should determine whether the control is in a state to process mnemonics and if whether the given character represents a mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法應判斷控制項是否處於處理助憶鍵的狀態，而且是否指定的字元是否表示助憶鍵。

trans-unit.source: If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果因此，此方法應該執行的助憶鍵和傳回相關聯的動作`true`。

trans-unit.source: If not, the method should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是，這個方法應傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Implementations of this method often use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A> method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the control's text.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法通常會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A>方法來判斷指定的字元是否符合控制項的文字中的助憶鍵。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.source: This default implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessMnemonic%2A> method simply returns `false` to indicate that the control has no mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessMnemonic%2A>方法只會傳回`false`來表示控制項具有沒有助憶鍵。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates an extension of the button class that overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessMnemonic%2A> method to exhibit custom behavior.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範會覆寫 按鈕類別的延伸<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessMnemonic%2A>至展現自訂行為的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example also demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanSelect%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanSelect%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example paste the following code after a form class, in the same file.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中貼上下列程式碼的表單類別之後，在相同的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Add a button of type `MnemonicButton` to the form.
trans-unit.target: 加入按鈕的型別`MnemonicButton`至表單。

trans-unit.target: 繼承類別呼叫這個方法的所有視窗。

trans-unit.source: It is strongly recommended that you provide the company name, product name, and product version.
trans-unit.target: 強烈建議您提供的公司名稱、 產品名稱和產品版本。

trans-unit.source: Providing this information enables the use of Windows Forms features such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.UserAppDataPath%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> that make it easier to write applications that comply with the "Certified for Windows" program.

trans-unit.target: 如需 Certified for Windows 程式的詳細資訊，請參閱http://msdn.microsoft.com/certification。

trans-unit.target: 取得表示傳播中 IME 模式的物件。

trans-unit.target: 表示傳播中 IME 模式的物件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> is providing help to accessibility applications.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> 為協助工具應用程式提供說明時。

trans-unit.source: You should use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> class to enable users to invoke help on your accessible object by pressing the F1 key.
trans-unit.target: 您應該使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>類別，讓使用者可以叫用可存取物件上的說明，請按 F1 鍵。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> provides you with complete information in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>中完整的資訊為您提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> classes to expose accessible information.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立可存取性感知的圖表控制，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject>類別會公開可存取的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The control plots two curves along with a legend.
trans-unit.target: 控制項會繪製兩條曲線，以及一個圖例。

trans-unit.source: The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control.
trans-unit.target: `ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別，衍生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，用於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>方法以提供圖表控制項的自訂存取資訊。

trans-unit.source: Since the chart legend is not an actual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not any built-in accessible information.
trans-unit.target: 因為圖表圖例不是實際<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>-為基礎的控制，但改為繪製所 chart 控制項中，它不會不含任何內建的可存取資訊。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.GetChild%2A> method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend.
trans-unit.target: 因為這個緣故，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.GetChild%2A>方法以傳回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示每個部分的圖例可存取的資訊。

trans-unit.source: When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information.
trans-unit.target: 當存取感知的應用程式使用這個控制項時，控制項可以提供必要的可存取資訊。

trans-unit.source: This code excerpt demonstrates handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryAccessibilityHelp> event.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼摘錄示範處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryAccessibilityHelp>事件。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> class overview for the complete code example.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>類別概觀的完整程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 發生於拖放作業時，讓拖曳來源能夠決定是否應取消拖放作業。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event is raised when there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>拖放作業期間鍵盤或滑鼠按鈕狀態變更時，會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>事件可讓拖曳來源能夠決定是否應取消拖放作業。

trans-unit.source: The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: 以下描述與拖放作業相關的事件，其引發的方法與時機。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method determines the control under the current cursor location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>方法會判斷目前的游標位置下的控制項。

trans-unit.source: It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: 接著會檢查此控制項是否為有效的置放目標。

trans-unit.source: If the control is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項為有效的置放目標，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>指定的拖放效果引發事件。

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 如需拖放效果的清單，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> 列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked.
trans-unit.target: 系統會追蹤滑鼠游標位置、鍵盤狀態和滑鼠按鈕狀態的變更。

trans-unit.source: If the user moves out of a window, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者移出視窗外，便會引發 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> 事件。

trans-unit.source: If the mouse enters another control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果滑鼠進入另一個控制項，便會引發該控制項的 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> 事件。

trans-unit.source: If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果滑鼠移動，但是待在相同的控制項內，便會引發 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> 事件。

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the event's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有鍵盤或滑鼠按鈕狀態變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>引發事件，並決定是否要繼續拖曳、 置放資料，或取消作業的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>的事件屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Continue`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是`Continue`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>就會引發事件，以繼續作業而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>具有新效果就會引發事件，以便設定適當的視覺化回應。

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 如需有效置放效果的清單，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> 列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>事件會經過配對，如此在滑鼠移動經過置放目標，不提供使用者最新的回應滑鼠的位置上。

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是`Drop`，置放效果值會傳回來源，如此來源應用程式可以執行適當作業資料來源; 例如，如果剪下資料作業是移動。

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Cancel`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是`Cancel`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> to `Cancel` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> if the ESC key was pressed and sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> to `Drop` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> if the left, middle, or right mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>事件設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>至`Cancel`中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>如果按下 ESC 鍵，並設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>至`Drop`中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>按下滑鼠左、 置中 或右鍵時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範兩個之間的拖放作業<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The example calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method when the drag action starts.
trans-unit.target: 範例會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>時拖曳動作開始的方法。

trans-unit.source: The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.DragSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> from the mouse location during the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果已移動滑鼠拖曳動作會啟動多個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.DragSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>期間的滑鼠位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IndexFromPoint%2A> method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IndexFromPoint%2A>方法用來決定要在拖曳的項目索引`MouseDown`事件。

trans-unit.source: The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也示範如何使用自訂游標拖放作業。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that two cursor files,`3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要有兩個資料指標檔案`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`、 自訂拖放到的應用程式目錄，存在於和不置放資料指標，分別。

trans-unit.source: The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck`<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> is checked.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用自訂游標`UseCustomCursorsCheck`<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>已核取。

trans-unit.source: The custom cursors are set in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 自訂的資料指標中所設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The keyboard state is evaluated in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based on state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys.
trans-unit.target: 鍵盤的狀態會在評估<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>右邊的事件處理常式`ListBox`，以決定在拖曳作業將會根據 SHIFT、 CTRL、 ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 鍵的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event.
trans-unit.target: 中的位置`ListBox`期間也決定會卸除`DragOver`事件。

trans-unit.source: If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Effect%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is set to `None` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>.
trans-unit.target: 如果要卸除的資料不是`String`，然後在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Effect%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>設`None`中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>.
trans-unit.target: 最後，卸除的狀態會顯示在`DropLocationLabel` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>。

trans-unit.source: The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop> event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供的權限卸除資料`ListBox`決定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop>事件處理常式和`String`中適當的位置加入值`ListBox`。

trans-unit.source: If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 如果在拖曳作業移動超出界限的表單，則取消拖放作業<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: This code excerpt demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼摘錄示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>事件。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method for the complete code example.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>完整程式碼範例的方法。

trans-unit.source: The event to raise.
trans-unit.target: 要引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.

trans-unit.source: Forces the re-creation of the handle for the control.
trans-unit.target: 強制重新建立控制項的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A> method is called whenever parameters are needed for a new control, but using a call from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateStyles%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A> is insufficient.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A>每當新的控制，需要參數，會呼叫方法，但使用的呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateStyles%2A>至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A>不足。

trans-unit.source: This method also calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DestroyHandle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle%2A> and sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreatingHandle%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法也會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DestroyHandle%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle%2A>並設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreatingHandle%2A>至`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control is currently re-creating its handle.
trans-unit.target: 取得指示控制項目前是否正重新建立其控制代碼的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control is currently re-creating its handle; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項目前正在重新建立其控制代碼，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreatingHandle%2A> property returns `true` if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A> method is still running on the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreatingHandle%2A>屬性會傳回`true`如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A>方法仍在控制項上執行。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RectangleToScreen%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PointToScreen%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseButtons%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlPaint.DrawReversibleFrame%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.IntersectsWith%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>成員。

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form called **Form1** containing several controls.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例，下列程式碼的呼叫格式貼**Form1**含有數個控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> events are connected to the event handlers defined in the example.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>事件都已連接的範例中定義的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" /> representing the handle of the control to reflect the message to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" />，表示要反映訊息的目標控制項控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> representing the Windows message to reflect.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />，表示要反映的 Windows 訊息。

trans-unit.source: Reflects the specified message to the control that is bound to the specified handle.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的訊息反映至繫結至指定控制代碼的控制項。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message was reflected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已反映訊息，為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ReflectMessage%2A> method is an infrastructure method and typically should not be called from your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ReflectMessage%2A>方法是基礎結構方法，通常不應該呼叫您的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: If the `hWnd` parameter does not represent a valid control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ReflectMessage%2A> method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`hWnd`參數不代表有效的控制，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ReflectMessage%2A>方法會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Because Windows messages are returned to the top-level window, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ReflectMessage%2A> method is used to propagate the return message to the control that sent the message.
trans-unit.target: 因為 Windows 訊息不會傳回至最上層視窗，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ReflectMessage%2A>方法用來傳播至控制項傳送該訊息傳回訊息。

trans-unit.source: for all windows to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法的所有視窗。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see langword="AllWindows" /> value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />.
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯：<see langword="AllWindows" />值<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />。

trans-unit.source: Forces the control to invalidate its client area and immediately redraw itself and any child controls.
trans-unit.target: 強制控制項使其工作區失效，並且立即重繪其本身和任何子控制項。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Refresh" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Refresh" /> method so the control and its child controls are invalidated and redrawn.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Refresh" />在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Refresh" />方法，使失效並且重繪控制項和其子控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the window region associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與控制項關聯的視窗區域。

trans-unit.source: The window <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 與控制項關聯的視窗 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />。

trans-unit.source: The window region is a collection of pixels within the window where the operating system permits drawing.
trans-unit.target: 視窗區域是像素為單位，其中作業系統允許繪製視窗內的集合。

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not display any portion of a window that lies outside of the window region.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統不會顯示在視窗的視窗區域外部的任何部分。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates of a control's region are relative to the upper-left corner of the control, not the client area of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的座標是區域的相對於控制項，而非工作區控制項的左上角。

trans-unit.source: The collection of pixels contained with the region can be noncontiguous.
trans-unit.target: 可以是不連續的像素區域中包含的集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Region%2A> property by creating a round button.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Region%2A>藉由建立圓形按鈕的屬性。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RegionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RegionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RegionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然後將其命名執行個體`Control1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RegionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This property is now obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性現在已過時。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control is rendered from right to left; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項是由右至左呈現則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 這個方法與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: You typically use this method if you are either creating a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> or creating your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: 您通常使用這個方法，如果您要建立的設計工具<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>或建立您自己的控制項加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 發生於重設控制項大小時。

trans-unit.source: To determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the resized control, you can cast the `sender` parameter of the registered <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventHandler> method to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> and get its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property (or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> properties individually).
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>的調整大小的控制項，您可以轉型`sender`參數的已註冊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventHandler>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>並取得其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>屬性 (或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>屬性個別）。

trans-unit.source: To handle custom layouts, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event instead of the Resize event.
trans-unit.target: 若要處理自訂版面配置，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>而不是調整大小事件的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event is raised in response to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize> event, but also in response to other changes that affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>引發以回應<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize>事件，但也在其他會影響控制項的配置變更回應。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: When the form is resized, the event handler ensures that the form stays square (its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> remain equal).
trans-unit.target: 重新調整表單大小，此事件處理常式可確保表單出現方形 (其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>仍相同)。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, make sure and associate this event-handling method with the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，請確定，然後將此事件處理方法產生關聯的表單<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control redraws itself when resized.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出控制項重設大小時，是否會重繪本身。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control redraws itself when resized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在重設大小時會重繪本身，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResizeRedraw%2A> property value is equivalent to the return value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetStyle%2A> method when passing in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.ResizeRedraw?displayProperty=nameWithType> value as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResizeRedraw%2A>屬性值相當於的傳回值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetStyle%2A>方法時傳入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.ResizeRedraw?displayProperty=nameWithType>做為參數的值。

trans-unit.source: Resumes the usual layout logic.
trans-unit.target: 繼續平常的配置邏輯。

trans-unit.source: Resumes usual layout logic.
trans-unit.target: 繼續平常的配置邏輯。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method forces an immediate layout if there are any pending layout requests.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>方法不論是否有任何暫止配置要求，強制立即配置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>一起用來隱藏多個方法是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>事件而調整控制項的多個屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you would typically call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method, then set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> properties of the control, and then call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method to enable the changes to take effect.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您通常會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>方法，然後設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>屬性的控制項，然後再呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>方法，讓變更生效。

trans-unit.source: There must be no pending calls to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> to be successfully called.
trans-unit.target: 必須有任何暫止呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>成功呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds two buttons to a form.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將兩個按鈕加入至表單。

trans-unit.source: The example transactions the addition of the buttons by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 範例交易使用的按鈕加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to execute pending layout requests; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 以執行暫止配置要求，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Resumes usual layout logic, optionally forcing an immediate layout of pending layout requests.
trans-unit.target: 繼續平常的配置邏輯，選擇性地強制暫止配置要求的立即配置。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method forces an immediate layout if there are any pending layout requests.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>方法不論是否有任何暫止配置要求，強制立即配置。

trans-unit.source: When the `performLayout` parameter is set to `true`, an immediate layout occurs if there are any pending layout requests.
trans-unit.target: 當`performLayout`參數設定為`true`，如果有任何暫止配置要求，就會發生的立即配置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>一起用來隱藏多個方法是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>事件而調整控制項的多個屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you would typically call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method, then set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> properties of the control, and then call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method to enable the changes to take effect.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您通常會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>方法，然後設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>屬性的控制項，然後再呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>方法，讓變更生效。

trans-unit.source: There must be no pending calls to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> to be successfully called.
trans-unit.target: 必須有任何暫止呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>成功呼叫。

trans-unit.source: When adding several controls to a parent control, it is recommended that you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method before initializing the controls to be added.
trans-unit.target: 將數個控制項加入至父控制項，建議您呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>方法初始化加入的控制項之前。

trans-unit.source: After adding the controls to the parent control, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 將控制項加入至父控制項之後, 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This will increase the performance of applications with many controls.
trans-unit.target: 這會增加具有許多控制項的應用程式的效能。

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance, in pixels, between the right edge of the control and the left edge of its container's client area.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項右邊緣和其容器工作區 (Client Area) 左邊緣之間的距離 (單位為像素)。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> representing the distance, in pixels, between the right edge of the control and the left edge of its container's client area.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，代表控制項右緣和其容器工作區左緣之間的距離 (單位為像素)。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A> property is equal to the sum of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A> property value and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A>屬性的總和等於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>屬性值和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A> property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A> 屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: You can change this property value indirectly by changing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> properties or calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBounds%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateBounds%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由變更的值，間接變更這個屬性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>屬性或呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBounds%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateBounds%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controls on a form and sets their size and location by using the various size-related and location-related properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立三個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>表單上的控制項，並將其大小和位置設定使用的各種大小與和位置相關的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> that has a width and height of at least 300 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>有寬度和高度的最少 300 像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether control's elements are aligned to support locales using right-to-left fonts.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出控制項的項目是否對齊，以支援使用由右至左字型的地區設定。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft.Inherit" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft.Inherit" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>屬性是環境的屬性。

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: 環境屬性是控制項屬性，如果未設定，將擷取從父控制項。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>具有相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>做為其父系<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>預設。

trans-unit.source: For more information about ambient properties, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> class or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 如需環境屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>類別或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property is used for international applications where the language is written from right to left, such as Hebrew or Arabic.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>屬性可用於國際應用程式的語言由右至左，例如希伯來文或阿拉伯文的寫入位置。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft.Yes?displayProperty=nameWithType>, control elements that include text are displayed from right to left.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft.Yes?displayProperty=nameWithType>，包含文字的控制項項目會由右至左顯示。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property is changed at run time, only raw text without formatting is preserved.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>屬性在執行階段變更，但不含格式只未經處理的文字會保留。

trans-unit.source: The following are a few examples of how control elements are affected by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft.Yes?displayProperty=nameWithType> :
trans-unit.target: 以下是幾個範例的控制項項目會受到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>屬性值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft.Yes?displayProperty=nameWithType>:

trans-unit.source: Vertical scroll bars are displayed on the left side rather than right side of scrollable controls (for example, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>).
trans-unit.target: 垂直捲軸會顯示在左邊，而不是可捲動的控制項的右端 (例如， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>、 多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>)。

trans-unit.source: Horizontal scroll bars start with the scroll box (thumb) right-aligned.
trans-unit.target: 水平捲軸的開頭為靠右對齊的捲動方塊 （捲動方塊）。

trans-unit.source: The check box element alignment, controlled by the `CheckAlign` property, is reversed for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: 所控制的核取方塊項目對齊`CheckAlign`屬性，為反轉<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Items in list box, combo box, and up-down controls are right aligned.
trans-unit.target: 清單方塊、 下拉式方塊和上下按鈕控制項中的項目會靠右對齊。

trans-unit.source: Up and down buttons are left-aligned on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown> controls.
trans-unit.target: 上下按鈕是 靠左對齊上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Menus (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>) are displayed right-aligned.
trans-unit.target: 功能表 (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>) 會顯示為靠右對齊。

trans-unit.source: The alignment of toolbar buttons on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control or the alignment of text on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> is not affected by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在工具列按鈕的對齊方式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>控制項或上的文字對齊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>不會受到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost> supports right-to-left alignment; however, the effect on an ActiveX control depends on the extent to which the control author implemented support for right-to-left display.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost> 支援由右至左對齊。不過，對 ActiveX 控制項的影響取決於控制項作者實作支援由右至左顯示的範圍。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 指派的值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft" /> property in a derived class, use the base class's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft" /> property to extend the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft" />屬性在衍生類別中，使用基底類別的<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft" />屬性擴充的基底實作。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, you must provide all the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 否則，您必須提供所有的實作。

trans-unit.source: You are not required to override both the <see langword="get" /> and <see langword="set" /> accessors of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft" /> property; you can override only one if needed.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要覆寫兩個<see langword="get" />和<see langword="set" />存取子<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft" />屬性; 您可以覆寫只能有一個必要。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft" /> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft" /> 屬性值變更時。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果會引發這個事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>以程式設計方式修改或使用者互動變更屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is an event handler that is executed when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會為事件處理常式時執行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>屬性值變更。
