trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class has several methods with the name pattern *PropertyName*`Changed` that are raised when the corresponding *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>類別有數種方法具有名稱模式*PropertyName* `Changed`所引發的時機對應*PropertyName*值變更 (*PropertyName*代表對應屬性的名稱)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example changes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> displaying currency data.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>顯示貨幣資料。

trans-unit.source: The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> if the number is negative and to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> if the number is positive.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會將文字轉換成十進位數字和變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>至<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>如果數值為負數，<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>如果數字為正數。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: Converts the current alignment to the appropriate alignment to support right-to-left text.
trans-unit.target: 將目前的對齊轉換為適當對齊以支援由右至左文字。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> to the appropriate <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> to support right-to-left text.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> 轉換為適當的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" />，以支援由右至左的文字。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> is set to `No`, the return value is equal to the `align` parameter passed in.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>設`No`，傳回的值等於`align`參數傳入。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" /> to the appropriate <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" /> to support right-to-left text.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" /> 轉換為適當的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" />，以支援由右至左的文字。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> is set to `No`, the return value is equal to the `align` parameter passed in.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>設`No`，傳回的值等於`align`參數傳入。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment" /> to the appropriate <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment" /> to support right-to-left text.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment" /> 轉換為適當的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment" />，以支援由右至左的文字。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> is set to `No`, the return value is equal to the `align` parameter passed in.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>設`No`，傳回的值等於`align`參數傳入。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> to the appropriate <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> to support right-to-left text.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> 轉換為適當的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" />，以支援由右至左的文字。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> is set to `No`, the return value is equal to the `align` parameter passed in.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>設`No`，傳回的值等於`align`參數傳入。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" /> to the appropriate <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" /> to support right-to-left text.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" /> 轉換為適當的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" />，以支援由右至左的文字。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> is set to `No`, the return value is equal to the `align` parameter passed in.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>設`No`，傳回的值等於`align`參數傳入。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment" /> to the appropriate <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment" /> to support right-to-left text.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment" /> 轉換為適當的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment" />，以支援由右至左的文字。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> is set to `No`, the return value is equal to the `align` parameter passed in.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>設`No`，傳回的值等於`align`參數傳入。

trans-unit.source: Scales the control and any child controls.
trans-unit.target: 縮放控制項和任何的子控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> containing the horizontal and vertical scaling factors.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />，包含水平和垂直縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: Scales the control and all child controls by the specified scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: 根據指定的縮放比例來縮放控制項和所有子控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale%2A> method scales the control by the specified scaling `factor`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale%2A>方法，根據指定的縮放比例來縮放控制項`factor`。

trans-unit.source: It also recursively scales all child controls if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleChildren%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 它也會以遞迴方式調整所有子控制項，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleChildren%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Internally, this method calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A> to scale each control.
trans-unit.target: 就內部而言，這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A>調整每個控制項。

trans-unit.source: The ratio to use for scaling.
trans-unit.target: 用於縮放的比例。

trans-unit.source: Scales the control and any child controls.
trans-unit.target: 縮放控制項和任何的子控制項。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: 水平縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: The vertical scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: 垂直縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: Scales the entire control and any child controls.
trans-unit.target: 縮放整個控制項和任何的子控制項。

trans-unit.source: The bitmap to scale.
trans-unit.target: 要調整的點陣圖。

trans-unit.source: Scales a logical bitmap value to it's equivalent device unit value when a DPI change occurs.
trans-unit.target: 發生 DPI 變更時，將邏輯點陣圖值調整為它的對等裝置單位值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines the scaling of child controls.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，以判斷子控制項的縮放。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if child controls will be scaled when the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale(System.Single)" /> method on this control is called; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果當呼叫此控制項上的 <see langword="true" /> 方法時會縮放子控制項，則為 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale(System.Single)" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleChildren%2A> property is `true`, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale%2A> method will recursively call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A> method of each of its child controls.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleChildren%2A>屬性是`true`，然後在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale%2A>方法會以遞迴方式呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A>每個子控制項的方法。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleChildren%2A> always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleChildren%2A>一律會傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can override <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleChildren%2A> to return `false` to indicate that scaling should not be performed on their children.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別可以覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleChildren%2A>傳回`false`表示的縮放比例不應執行它們的子系。

trans-unit.source: The factor by which the height and width of the control will be scaled.
trans-unit.target: 控制項高度與寬度的縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> value that specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining its size and position.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> 值，指定在定義控制項的大小和位置時所用的控制項範圍。

trans-unit.source: Scales a control's location, size, padding and margin.
trans-unit.target: 縮放控制項的位置、大小、邊框間距和邊界。

trans-unit.source: If the control is top level, this will not scale the control's location.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項是最上層，將不會縮放控制項的位置。

trans-unit.source: This does not scale children or the size of automatically sized controls.
trans-unit.target: 這無法調整大小的自動調整大小的控制項或其子系。

trans-unit.source: You can omit scaling in any direction by changing the value of the `specified` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 您可以省略任何方向中的值變更的縮放比例`specified`參數。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: 水平縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: The vertical scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: 垂直縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Activates a control.
trans-unit.target: 啟動控制項。

trans-unit.source: Activates the control.
trans-unit.target: 啟動控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> method activates the control if the control's `Selectable` style bit is set to `true` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>方法啟動控制項，如果控制項的`Selectable`樣式位元會設為`true`中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>、 它包含在另一個控制項和所有其父控制項都是可見並已啟用。

trans-unit.source: The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable.
trans-unit.target: 下列清單中的 Windows Form 控制項不能選取。

trans-unit.source: Controls derived from controls in the list will also not be selectable.
trans-unit.target: 從清單中的控制項衍生控制項也不會選取。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> (when there is no link present in the control)
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> （如果沒有在控制項中顯示連結）

trans-unit.source: The following code example selects the specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, if it is selectable.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會選取指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>、 如果可供選取。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 以指定要選取控制項的方向，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to move forward in the tab order; <see langword="false" /> to move backward in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 會在定位順序中向前移動。<see langword="false" /> 會在定位順序中向後移動。

trans-unit.source: Activates a child control.
trans-unit.target: 啟動子控制項。

trans-unit.source: Optionally specifies the direction in the tab order to select the control from.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性指定定位順序中要選取控制項的方向。

trans-unit.source: The `directed` and `forward` parameters are used by container-style controls.
trans-unit.target: `directed`和`forward`容器樣式控制項使用的參數。

trans-unit.source: When the `directed` parameter is set to `true`, the `forward` parameter is evaluated to determine which control to select.
trans-unit.target: 當`directed`參數設定為`true`、`forward`參數進行評估以判斷哪一個控制項來選取。

trans-unit.source: When `forward` is set to `true`, the next control in the tab order is selected; when `false`, the previous control in the tab order is selected.
trans-unit.target: 當`forward`設為`true`，定位順序中的下一個控制項已選取; 當`false`，選取先前的控制項定位順序中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> method activates the control if the control's `Selectable` style bit is set to `true` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>方法啟動控制項，如果控制項的`Selectable`樣式位元會設為`true`中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>、 它包含在另一個控制項和所有其父控制項都是可見並已啟用。

trans-unit.source: The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable.
trans-unit.target: 下列清單中的 Windows Form 控制項不能選取。

trans-unit.source: Controls derived from controls in the list will also not be selectable.
trans-unit.target: 從清單中的控制項衍生控制項也不會選取。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> (when there is no link present in the control)
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> （如果沒有在控制項中顯示連結）

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> at which to start the search.
trans-unit.target: 要從其開始搜尋的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to move forward in the tab order; <see langword="false" /> to move backward in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 會在定位順序中向前移動。<see langword="false" /> 會在定位順序中向後移動。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to ignore the controls with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop" /> property set to <see langword="false" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 會忽略 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="false" /> 的控制項，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include nested (children of child controls) child controls; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 會包含巢狀 (子控制項的子系) 子控制項，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to continue searching from the first control in the tab order after the last control has been reached; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 會在到達最後一個控制項後，從定位順序中的第一個控制項繼續搜尋，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Activates the next control.
trans-unit.target: 啟動下一個控制項。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a control was activated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟動控制項，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> method activates the next control in the tab order if the control's `Selectable` style bit is set to `true` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>方法啟動的下一個控制項定位順序中，如果控制項的`Selectable`樣式位元會設為`true`中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>、 它包含在另一個控制項和所有其父控制項都是可見並已啟用。

trans-unit.source: The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable.
trans-unit.target: 下列清單中的 Windows Form 控制項不能選取。

trans-unit.source: Controls derived from controls in the list will also not be selectable.
trans-unit.target: 從清單中的控制項衍生控制項也不會選取。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> (when there is no link present in the control)
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> （如果沒有在控制項中顯示連結）

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> methods, or by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 當您藉由呼叫中使用鍵盤 （TAB、 SHIFT + TAB，等等） 變更焦點時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>方法，或藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性目前的表單，焦點事件會發生順序如下：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated> events are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A>屬性設定為`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>事件都會被隱藏。

trans-unit.source: The following code exampleshows the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> method being used in a form that has some controls.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>某些控制項的表單中使用的方法。

trans-unit.source: Each time that you click the form, the next control is activated.
trans-unit.target: 每次您按一下表單上，啟動下一個控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> property gets the currently active control in the container control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>屬性會取得目前作用中控制項的容器控制項中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> method being used in a form that has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> and some other controls.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>方法中的表單使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>和一些其他控制項。

trans-unit.source: When you click the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>, the next control after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> is activated.
trans-unit.target: 當您按一下<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>之後, 的下一個控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>已啟動。

trans-unit.source: Notice that you have to get the parent of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，您需要取得的父代<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Since <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> is not a container, calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> directly on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> would not change the activation.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>不是一個容器，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>直接依據<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>就不會變更啟用。

trans-unit.source: Sends the control to the back of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: 將控制項傳送到疊置順序的後面。

trans-unit.source: The control is moved to the back of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: 將控制項移到疊置順序最下層。

trans-unit.source: If the control is a child of another control, the child control is moved to the back of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項是其他控制項的子系，子控制項移動到疊置順序最下層。

trans-unit.source: If the control is a top-level control, this method will not work correctly unless the control is active.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項是最上層控制項，這個方法無法正常運作除非控制項為作用中。

trans-unit.source: A top-level control is a control, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, that is not a child of another control.
trans-unit.target: 最上層控制項是一個控制項，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>，也就是沒有子系的另一個控制項。

trans-unit.source: An active control is a visible control that has input focus.
trans-unit.target: 現用控制項是可見的控制項，具有輸入焦點。

trans-unit.source: To use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SendToBack%2A> method with an inactive, top-level control, first call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BringToFront%2A> method on the control.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SendToBack%2A>方法與非作用中、 最上層控制項，先呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BringToFront%2A>控制項上的方法。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Sets a value indicating how a control will behave when its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize" /> property is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 設定值，表示已啟用控制項的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize" /> 屬性時，該控制項的行為模式為何。

trans-unit.source: Sets the bounds of the control.
trans-unit.target: 設定控制項的範圍。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the bounds of the control to the specified location and size.
trans-unit.target: 將控制項的範圍設定為指定的位置和大小。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> 值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: For any parameter not specified, the current value will be used.
trans-unit.target: 任何未指定的參數會使用目前的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified bounds of the control to the specified location and size.
trans-unit.target: 將控制項的指定範圍設定為指定的位置和大小。

trans-unit.source: The following code example centers a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> on the screen in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例是為主<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>在螢幕上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>事件。

trans-unit.source: This will keep the form centered as the user resizes it.
trans-unit.target: 如此可保留置中隨著使用者調整它的格式。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您已建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> 值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: Performs the work of setting the specified bounds of this control.
trans-unit.target: 執行設定這個控制項的指定範圍的工作。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the parameters that correspond to the bounds not included in the `specified` parameter are passed in with their current values.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，對應到範圍中不包含參數`specified`參數傳入其目前值。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>, or the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> or <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> property can be passed in with a reference to the current instance of the control.
trans-unit.target: 例如， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>，或<xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>或<xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>屬性可以傳入控制項的目前執行個體的參考。

trans-unit.source: However all values passed in are honored and applied to the control.
trans-unit.target: 不過會接受所有傳入的值，而套用至控制項。

trans-unit.source: The `boundsSpecified` parameter represents the elements of the controls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bounds%2A> changed by your application.
trans-unit.target: `boundsSpecified`參數代表控制項的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bounds%2A>變更您的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the control, the `boundsSpecified` parameter value is the `Size` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>控制項的`boundsSpecified`參數值是`Size`值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>。

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> is adjusted in response to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property being set, the `boundsSpecified` parameter value is the `None` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>調整以回應<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>屬性設定，`boundsSpecified`參數值是`None`值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>。

trans-unit.source: On Windows Server 2003 systems, the size of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> is restricted by the maximum pixel width and height of the monitor.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Server 2003 系統上，大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>受到最大像素寬度和高度的監視。

trans-unit.source: The following code example overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A> method to ensure that the control remains a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A>方法，以確保控制項維持固定的大小。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a class that is either directly or indirectly derived from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您有直接或間接衍生自類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>類別。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified)" /> method to force the bounds of the control to change.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified)" />在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified)" />方法，以強制變更控制項的範圍。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can add size restrictions to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別可以加入大小限制<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: The client area width, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 工作區寬度 (單位為像素)。

trans-unit.source: The client area height, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 工作區高度 (單位為像素)。

trans-unit.source: Sets the size of the client area of the control.
trans-unit.target: 設定控制項工作區的大小。

trans-unit.source: The client area starts at the (0, 0) location and extends to the (`x`, `y`) location.
trans-unit.target: 工作區開始 （0，0） 的位置並延伸到 (`x`， `y`) 位置。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you should not set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSize%2A> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您不應將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSize%2A>的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A> method to ensure that the control remains square.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A>方法，以確保控制項仍為正方形。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a class that is either directly or indirectly derived from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您有直接或間接衍生自類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>類別。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore(System.Int32,System.Int32)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore(System.Int32,System.Int32)" /> method so that the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSize" /> property is adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore(System.Int32,System.Int32)" />在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore(System.Int32,System.Int32)" />方法以便<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSize" />調整屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about drawing on controls, see [Rendering a Windows Forms Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-a-windows-forms-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需控制項繪製的相關資訊，請參閱[呈現 Windows Form 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-a-windows-forms-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles" /> bit to set.
trans-unit.target: 要設定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles" /> 位元。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to apply the specified style to the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 會將指定的樣式套用至控制項，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles" /> flag to either <see langword="true" /> or <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles" /> 旗標設定為 <see langword="true" /> 或 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Control style bit flags are used to categorize supported behavior.
trans-unit.target: 控制項樣式位元旗標用來支援的行為分類。

trans-unit.source: A control can enable a style by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A> method and passing in the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> bit (or bits) and the Boolean value to set the bit(s) to.
trans-unit.target: 控制項可以藉由呼叫啟用樣式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A>方法並傳入適當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>位元 （或位元） 及要設為位元的布林值。

trans-unit.source: To determine the value assigned to a specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> bit, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetStyle%2A> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> member to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷指派給指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>位元，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetStyle%2A>方法並傳入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>成員來評估。

trans-unit.source: Setting the control style bits can substantially change the behavior of the control.
trans-unit.target: 設定控制項樣式位元，可以大幅變更控制項的行為。

trans-unit.source: Review the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> enumeration documentation to understand the effects of changing the control style bits before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 檢閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>列舉文件以了解變更控制項樣式位元，然後再呼叫的效果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example enables double-buffering on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and updates the styles to reflect the changes.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例可讓在雙重緩衝<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>並更新以反映變更的樣式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to set the control as the top-level control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 會將控制項設定為最上層控制項，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the control as the top-level control.
trans-unit.target: 將控制項設定為最上層控制項。

trans-unit.source: If you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetTopLevel%2A> method of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and pass in a value of `false`, the form will not be visible until you call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetTopLevel%2A> again, passing in a value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetTopLevel%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>並傳入的值`false`，無法顯示表單，直到您呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetTopLevel%2A>同樣地，值為傳遞`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> parameter is set to <see langword="true" /> and the control is an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 參數設定為 <see langword="true" />，而且控制項是 ActiveX 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetTopLevel" /> return value is not equal to the <paramref name="value" /> parameter and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent" /> property is not <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetTopLevel" /> 傳回值不等於 <paramref name="value" /> 參數，而且 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent" /> 屬性不是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: to set the control as a top-level control if it is of any type other than <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要將控制項設定為最上層控制項，如果它不是任何類型的<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" />。

trans-unit.source: This permission is only demanded if the <paramref name="value" /> parameter is <see langword="true" /> and the control is not an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: 如果只要求此使用權限<paramref name="value" />參數是<see langword="true" />和控制項不是 ActiveX 控制項。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see langword="AllWindows" /> value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />.
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯：<see langword="AllWindows" />值<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to make the control visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示將控制項設為可見，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the control to the specified visible state.
trans-unit.target: 將控制項設定為指定的可見狀態。

trans-unit.source: You would typically override this method to change the visibility behavior of the control.
trans-unit.target: 您通常會覆寫此方法以變更控制項的可見性行為。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetVisibleCore(System.Boolean)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetVisibleCore(System.Boolean)" /> method to force the visibility of the control to change.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetVisibleCore(System.Boolean)" />在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetVisibleCore(System.Boolean)" />方法，以強制變更控制項的可見性。

trans-unit.source: Displays the control to the user.
trans-unit.target: 對使用者顯示控制項。

trans-unit.source: Showing the control is equivalent to setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 顯示控制項相當於設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A> method is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property returns a value of `true` until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 之後<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A>呼叫方法時，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>屬性會傳回值為`true`直到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays an about dialog box and temporarily draws a blue square on its surface.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示關於 對話方塊，並暫時將藍色方繪製在其介面。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have defined a class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `AboutDialog`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您已定義的類別，衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>名為`AboutDialog`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control should display focus rectangles.
trans-unit.target: 取得指示控制項是否應顯示焦點矩形 (Focus Rectangle) 的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control should display focus rectangles; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項應顯示焦點矩形，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about this feature, see the[WM_CHANGEUISTATE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646342\(v=vs.85\).aspx),[WM_QUERYUISTATE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646355\(v=vs.85\).aspx), and the [WM_UPDATEUISTATE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646361\(v=vs.85\).aspx)topics.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關這項功能的詳細資訊，請參閱[WM_CHANGEUISTATE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646342\(v=vs.85\).aspx)，[WM_QUERYUISTATE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646355\(v=vs.85\).aspx)，而[WM_UPDATEUISTATE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646361\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主題。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ShowFocusCues" /> property in a derived class, use the base class's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ShowFocusCues" /> property to extend the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ShowFocusCues" />屬性在衍生類別中，使用基底類別的<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ShowFocusCues" />屬性擴充的基底實作。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, you must provide all the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 否則，您必須提供所有的實作。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the user interface is in the appropriate state to show or hide keyboard accelerators.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出使用者介面是否處於可顯示或隱藏鍵盤快速鍵的適當狀態下。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the keyboard accelerators are visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以看到鍵盤快速鍵，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: In controls created in the Windows Forms designer, keyboard accelerators are visible by default.
trans-unit.target: 在控制項中建立 Windows Form 設計工具中，鍵盤快速鍵會預設為可見。

trans-unit.source: For more information about this feature, see the[WM_CHANGEUISTATE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646342\(v=vs.85\).aspx),[WM_QUERYUISTATE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646355\(v=vs.85\).aspx), and the [WM_UPDATEUISTATE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646361\(v=vs.85\).aspx)topics.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關這項功能的詳細資訊，請參閱[WM_CHANGEUISTATE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646342\(v=vs.85\).aspx)，[WM_QUERYUISTATE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646355\(v=vs.85\).aspx)，而[WM_UPDATEUISTATE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646361\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主題。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the site of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的站台。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISite" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />, if any.
trans-unit.target: 與 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISite" /> 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> (如果有)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height and width of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的高度和寬度。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the height and width of the control in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 表示控制項高度和寬度的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> (單位為像素)。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> class is a value type (`Structure` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], `struct` in Visual C#), it is returned by value, meaning accessing the property returns a copy of the size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Drawing.Size>類別是實值類型 (`Structure`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]， `struct` Visual C# 中)，它會傳回值，表示存取屬性會傳回控制項大小的複本。

trans-unit.source: So, adjusting the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> or <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> returned from this property will not affect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 因此，調整<xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>或<xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>屬性<xref:System.Drawing.Size>傳回從這個屬性將不會影響<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>的控制項。

trans-unit.source: To adjust the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> of the control, you must set the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> property, or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property with a new <xref:System.Drawing.Size>.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>的控制項，您必須設定控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>屬性或 set<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>與新的屬性<xref:System.Drawing.Size>。

trans-unit.source: To maintain better performance, do not set the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> of a control in its constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要維持較佳的效能，請勿設定<xref:System.Drawing.Size>其建構函式中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The preferred method is to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 慣用的方法是覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: On Windows Server 2003 systems, the size of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> is restricted by the maximum pixel width and height of the monitor.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Server 2003 系統上，大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>受到最大像素寬度和高度的監視。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> to a form and sets some of its common properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>至表單，並設定一些常見的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The example anchors the button to the bottom-right corner of the form so it keeps its relative position as the form is resized.
trans-unit.target: 此範例錨定至表單的右下角的按鈕，以便調整表單大小時，則會保持其相對位置。

trans-unit.source: Next it sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A> and resizes the button to the same size as the <xref:System.Drawing.Image>.
trans-unit.target: 接下來設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A>並調整大小的按鈕，以做為相同大小<xref:System.Drawing.Image>。

trans-unit.source: The example then sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A> to `true` and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 範例接著會設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A>至`true`並設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Lastly, it adds an event handler to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event of the button.
trans-unit.target: 最後，它會加入事件處理常式來處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>按鈕的事件。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> named `imageList1`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>名為`imageList1`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size" /> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size" /> 屬性值變更時。

trans-unit.source: It is preferable to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event to handle custom layouts.
trans-unit.target: 最好是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>事件，以處理自訂版面配置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event is raised in response to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize> events, but also in other conditions when layout might need to be applied.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>引發以回應<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize>事件，但也在其他條件時可能需要套用的版面配置。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果會引發這個事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>以程式設計方式修改或使用者互動變更屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: An instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control has been provided that can be scaled both horizontally and vertically.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>已經提供的可以水平及垂直縮放控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> instance provides the horizontal and vertical scale value.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>執行個體會提供水平及垂直的小數位數值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> instance named **OK** is used to set the scale values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>名為執行個體**確定**用來設定的標尺值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制項執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Whenever the size of the control changes, the event handler associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged> event of the control is called.
trans-unit.target: 每當控制項的大小變更時，相關聯的事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged>稱為控制項的事件。

trans-unit.source: This event handler displays a message box indicating that the size of the control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件處理常式會顯示訊息方塊，指出控制項的大小已變更。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> value representing the height and width of the control's client area.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> 值，表示控制項工作區的高度和寬度。

trans-unit.source: Determines the size of the entire control from the height and width of its client area.
trans-unit.target: 從控制項的工作區之高度和寬度判斷整個控制項的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> value representing the height and width of the entire control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> 值，表示整個控制項的高度和寬度。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control style changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於控制項樣式變更時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.StyleChanged> event occurs when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> flags have been added or changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.StyleChanged>就會發生事件時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>旗標已加入或變更。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the control style is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項樣式變更以程式設計方式修改或使用者互動，就會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.StyleChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.StyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.StyleChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然後將其命名執行個體`Control1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.StyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Temporarily suspends the layout logic for the control.
trans-unit.target: 暫停控制項的配置邏輯。

trans-unit.source: The layout logic of the control is suspended until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的配置邏輯已暫止，直到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>一起用來隱藏多個方法是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>事件而調整控制項的多個屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you would typically call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method, then set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> properties of the control, and then call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method to enable the changes to take effect.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您通常會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>方法，然後設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>屬性的控制項，然後再呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>方法，讓變更生效。

trans-unit.source: There must be no pending calls to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> to be successfully called.
trans-unit.target: 必須有任何暫止呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>成功呼叫。

trans-unit.source: When adding several controls to a parent control, it is recommended that you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method before initializing the controls to be added.
trans-unit.target: 將數個控制項加入至父控制項，建議您呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>方法初始化加入的控制項之前。

trans-unit.source: After adding the controls to the parent control, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 將控制項加入至父控制項之後, 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This will increase the performance of applications with many controls.
trans-unit.target: 這會增加具有許多控制項的應用程式的效能。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds two buttons to a form.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將兩個按鈕加入至表單。

trans-unit.source: The example transactions the addition of the buttons by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 範例交易使用的按鈕加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the system colors change.
trans-unit.target: 發生於系統色彩變更時。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors> is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果會引發這個事件<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors>來以程式設計方式修改或使用者互動變更。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SystemColorsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SystemColorsChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SystemColorsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然後將其命名執行個體`Control1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SystemColorsChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the tab order of the control within its container.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項容器中的控制項定位順序。

trans-unit.source: The index value of the control within the set of controls within its container.
trans-unit.target: 在控制項集合內的控制項之索引值 (在其容器內)。

trans-unit.source: The controls in the container are included in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 容器內的控制項會包含在定位順序中。

trans-unit.source: A tab index can consist of any valid integer greater than or equal to zero, lower numbers being earlier in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 定位點索引可以包含任何有效的整數大於或等於零，較低的數字，在稍早在定位順序。

trans-unit.source: If more than one control on the same parent control has the same tab index, the z-order of the controls determines the order to cycle through the controls.
trans-unit.target: 如果在相同的父控制項上的多個控制項具有相同的索引，控制項疊置順序會決定的順序，以循環的控制項。

trans-unit.source: For a control to be included in the tab order, its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A> property must be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的定位順序，包含其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A>屬性必須設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> to a form and sets some of its common properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>至表單，並設定一些常見的屬性。

trans-unit.target: 範例接著會設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A>至`true`並設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.target: 最後，它會加入事件處理常式來處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>按鈕的事件。

trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>。
